org.richfaces.fragment.editor

Interface Editor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RichFacesEditor

    public interface Editor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the editor's input.
      String getText()
      Gets the text which is currently typed in the editor.
      void type(String text)
      Types the given text into the editor's input.

    • Method Detail

      • type

        void type(String text)
        Types the given text into the editor's input.
        Parameters:
        text - to be filled into the editor

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the editor's input. In other words it erases all characters from the editor.

      • getText

        String getText()
        Gets the text which is currently typed in the editor.
        Returns:
        text filled in the editor
